info.description: This is the API that serves as the central interaction point between the client and back-end services of Earthdata Pub.
info.title: EarthdataPub

tags.name: notification
tags.description: Interact with the notification system. Send a note, subscribe or unsubscribe to events.

tags.name: action
tags.description: Interact with the action system. Invoke an action, or register a custom action.

tags.name: service
tags.description: Used to manage a submission via the service endpoints & service authorizer.

tags.name: metrics
tags.description: Retrieve system metrics or submit client side events to be logged.

tags.name: applications
tags.description: Serves static files for frontend applications.

get.description: Returns a single submission by ID
Returns list of submissions

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the submission, this typically the same as the data product name.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The unique id of the user who initiated the submission.

parameters.name: daac_id
parameters.description: The unique id of the DAAC the submission has been assigned to.

parameters.name: workflow_id
parameters.description: The unique id of the current workflow of the submission.

parameters.name: workflow_name
parameters.description: The long_name field of the current workflow of the submission.

parameters.name: step_name
parameters.description: The name/key of the current step of the current workflow of the submission.

parameters.name: step_type
parameters.description: The type of the current step of the current workflow of the submission.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status message of the submission.

parameters.name: created_after
parameters.description: Minimum datetime for narrowing results by creation time.

parameters.name: created_before
parameters.description: Maximum datetime for narrowing results by creation time.

parameters.name: last_change_after
parameters.description: Minimum datetime for narrowing results by most recent activity.

parameters.name: last_change_before
parameters.description: Maximum datetime for narrowing results by most recent activity.

parameters.name: hidden
parameters.description: Descriptor as to whether or not this submission is withdrawn.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: What field to sort results on.

parameters.description: Order of results, 'asc' for ascending, 'desc' for descending.

parameters.description: Number of results per page for pagination.

parameters.description: Page number to start at for pagination.

Submits a form's data for review
Save form data for submission
Approve or reject a submission step
Initiate removal of temporary service credential when service operations complete.
Withdraw a submission setting it's default visibility to hidden

get.description: Gets a list of active Daacs
Operation to retrieve metrics for display on dashboard.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Start of the time range to view

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: End of the time range to view

parameters.name: event_type
parameters.description: Type of events to view, e.g. workflow_transitions, errors, logins

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: True will return a count of events of the given type within the time range, false will return the individual events and their associated data.

post.description: Sends a client-side event to the system to be logged. Typically this would be an error.

parameters.description: Unique key of metrics report to fetch

get.description: Returns a single metrics report by its unique key

Cognito_Authorizer.name: Authorization
Cognito_Authorizer.description: This authorizer is used for most requests to the EDPub API with the exception of service endpoints. The authorization value follows the format: 'Bearer \<JWT token value\>'

Service_Authorizer.name: Authorization
Service_Authorizer.description: This authorizer is used for authentication for service enabled endpoints. The authorization value format is: 'Basic \<value of encoding serviceId:serviceSecret using base64\>'
